gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: Open File 2219;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=130854;G Map Series C21507G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127793;G Map Series C21508G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127795;G Map Series C21509G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127797;G Map Series C41507G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127794;G Map Series C41508G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127796;G Map Series C41509G;https://geoscan.nrcan.gc.ca/starweb/geoscan/servlet.starweb?path=geoscan/fulle.web&search1=R=127798;

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This airborne survey recorded data from Total Field Magnetic, Vertical Gradient of TF and Very Low Frequency parameters. It was performed between 1988-07-26 and 1988-08-05. The data were digitally acquired. The platform(s) used were Fixed-wing.

gmd:TextGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Ce levé aéroporté comporte des mesures de paramètres de champ magnétique total, Vertical Gradient of TF et de très basse fréquence. Il a été effectué du 1988-07-26 au 1988-08-05. Les données ont été acquises de façon numérique. Le type de plateforme employée était Aile-fixe.

geox:instrument1.gco:CharacterString: mag:SCINTREX, OPTICALLY PUMPED, VIM 2321 A1,A2, , CESIUM,

GSC-MagRadEm.data_class_code: MAG "Total Field Magnetic" "Champ magnétique total" MAG_VG "Vertical Gradient of TF" "Gradient vertical du CT" VLF "Very Low Frequency" "très basse fréquence"
